com.nexmo.client

Interface NexmoMediaActionEventListener


  • public interface NexmoMediaActionEventListener
    NexmoMediaActionEventListener dispatches a NexmoMediaActionEvent related to a NexmoConversation.

    Available events on a NexmoMediaActionEventListener are:

    • onMute(NexmoMediaActionEvent)
    • onEarmuff(NexmoMediaActionEvent)

    Example usage:

         nexmoClient.newConversation(CONVERSATION_NAME, CONVERSATION_DISPLAY_NAME, new NexmoRequestListener<NexmoConversation>() {
         @Override
         public void onSuccess(NexmoConversation conversation) {
              // Update the application UI here if needed.
          conversation.addMediaActionEventListener(new NexmoMediaActionEventListener(){
         @Override
               void onMute(NexmoMediaActionEvent event){
                  Log.d("NexmoMediaActionEventListener:onMute", "Got [" + event.getMediaStatus() + "] from:" + event.getMember().getId());

               }
         @Override
               void onEarmuff(NexmoMediaActionEvent event){
                  Log.d("NexmoMediaActionEventListener:onEarmuff", "Got [" + event.getMediaStatus() + "] from:" + event.getMember().getId());

               }
          });
         }
         @Override
         public void onError(NexmoAPIError error) {
              // Update the application UI here if needed.
         }
    });
